Detailed Description

This class provides abstraction to crowders. A crowder perform preselection before its body processes the population, and controls the replacement after.

Version:
2.0
Since:
2.0

Says if the crowder is elitist or not.

Returns:

void jenes.stage.operator.Crowder< T extends Chromosome >.setElitist ( boolean  flag  ) 

Sets the crowder elistism. If true, offspings replace parents only if they are better.

Parameters:
flag 

void jenes.stage.operator.Crowder< T extends Chromosome >.process ( Population< T >  in,
Population< T >  out 
) throws StageException

Performs crowding processing, according the the following scheme:

  1. pre = preselect(in)
  2. evo = body.process(pre)
  3. out = replace(evo)
Parameters:
in 
out 
Exceptions:
StageException

Population< T >  preselected,
Population< T >  evolved,
Population< T >  out 
) [protected, pure virtual]

Implements the replacement policy.

Parameters:
initial - the initial population
preselected - the population resulting from preselection
evolved - the part of population that has evolved
out - the output population

double jenes.stage.operator.Crowder< T extends Chromosome >.similarity ( double[]  diff  ) 

Computes a degree of similarity given the genetic difference vector between two chromosomes. By default, similarity is computed as reprocical of eucledian distance between genes. Other definitions are possible by overriding this method in subclasses.

Parameters:
diff - the difference vector
Returns:
similarity degree
